thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Home BancShares Authorized Increase Of 5 Mln Shares Under Stock Repurchase Program

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Home BancShares Authorized Increase Of 5 Mln Shares Under Stock Repurchase Program
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Home Bancshares Inc:
* HOME BANCSHARES, INC. INCREASES SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM * HOME BANCSHARES INC - AUTHORIZED INCREASE OF 5 MILLION IN NUMBER OF SHARES OF STOCK AVAILABLE UNDER ITS COMMON STOCK REPURCHASE PROGRAM
* HOME BANCSHARES INC - ‍ SHARE REPURCHASE AUTHORIZATION WAS MADE IN ANTICIPATION OF CAPITAL GROWTH EXPECTED AS A RESULT OF “TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
